step.sql: INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK (PID) (SELECT LINK_PID FROM RD_LINK WHERE MESH_ID [mesh]);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK (PID) (SELECT LINK_PID FROM RD_LINK WHERE SDO_ANYINTERACT(GEOMETRY, [area]) = 'TRUE');
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_FILTER_RD_NODE (PID) (SELECT NODE_PID FROM RD_NODE_MESH WHERE MESH_ID [mesh]);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_FILTER_RD_NODE (PID) (SELECT NODE_PID FROM RD_NODE WHERE SDO_ANYINTERACT(GEOMETRY, [area]) = 'TRUE');
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_SPEEDLIMIT (PID) (SELECT PID FROM RD_SPEEDLIMIT WHERE MESH_ID [mesh]);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_SPEEDLIMIT (PID) (SELECT PID FROM RD_SPEEDLIMIT WHERE SDO_ANYINTERACT(GEOMETRY, [area]) = 'TRUE');
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK (PID) (SELECT P.LINK_PID FROM RD_SPEEDLIMIT P, TEMP_RD_SPEEDLIMIT T WHERE P.PID=T.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_ELECTRONICEYE (PID) (SELECT PID FROM RD_ELECTRONICEYE WHERE MESH_ID [mesh]);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_ELECTRONICEYE (PID) (SELECT PID FROM RD_ELECTRONICEYE WHERE SDO_ANYINTERACT(GEOMETRY, [area]) = 'TRUE');
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_ELECEYE_GROUP (PID) (SELECT DISTINCT(P.GROUP_ID) FROM RD_ELECEYE_PART P,TEMP_RD_ELECTRONICEYE T WHERE P.ELECEYE_PID=T.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK (PID) (SELECT P.LINK_PID FROM RD_ELECTRONICEYE P, TEMP_RD_ELECTRONICEYE T WHERE P.PID=T.PID);

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK (PID) (SELECT L.LINK_PID FROM RD_LINK L WHERE L.S_NODE_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM (SELECT COUNT(1), N.PID FROM RD_NODE_MESH M, TEMP_FILTER_RD_NODE N WHERE M.NODE_PID = N.PID GROUP BY N.PID HAVING COUNT(1) > 1)) UNION ALL SELECT L.LINK_PID FROM RD_LINK L WHERE L.E_NODE_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM (SELECT COUNT(1), N.PID FROM RD_NODE_MESH M, TEMP_FILTER_RD_NODE N WHERE M.NODE_PID = N.PID GROUP BY N.PID HAVING COUNT(1) > 1)) );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_SIGNPOST (PID) (SELECT P.PID FROM RD_SIGNPOST P, TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID = T.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK (PID) (SELECT P.LINK_PID FROM RD_SIGNPOST_LINK P,TEMP_RD_SIGNPOST T WHERE P.SIGNPOST_PID=T.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_INTER (PID) (SELECT CN.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_NODE N, RD_INTER_NODE CN WHERE N.PID = CN.NODE_PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_INTER (PID) (SELECT CN.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_INTER_LINK CN WHERE N.PID = CN.LINK_PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK (PID) (SELECT P.LINK_PID FROM RD_INTER_LINK P, TEMP_RD_INTER T WHERE P.PID = T.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_NODE (PID) (SELECT P.NODE_PID FROM RD_INTER_NODE P, TEMP_RD_INTER T WHERE P.PID = T.PID);
SELECT P.* FROM RD_INTER P, TEMP_RD_INTER T WHERE P.PID = T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_INTER_LINK P,TEMP_RD_INTER T WHERE P.PID = T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_INTER_NODE P,TEMP_RD_INTER T WHERE P.PID = T.PID;
DELETE FROM RD_INTER P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_INTER T);
DELETE FROM RD_INTER_LINK P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_INTER T);
DELETE FROM RD_INTER_NODE P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_INTER T);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_INTER SELECT PID FROM RD_INTER A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM RD_INTER B WHERE A.PID = B.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_ROAD (PID) (SELECT CN.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_ROAD_LINK CN WHERE N.PID = CN.LINK_PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK (PID) (SELECT P.LINK_PID FROM RD_ROAD_LINK P, TEMP_RD_ROAD T WHERE P.PID = T.PID);
SELECT P.* FROM RD_ROAD P,TEMP_RD_ROAD T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_ROAD_LINK P,TEMP_RD_ROAD T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
DELETE FROM RD_ROAD P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_ROAD T);
DELETE FROM RD_ROAD_LINK P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_ROAD T);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_ROAD SELECT PID FROM RD_ROAD A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM RD_ROAD B WHERE A.PID = B.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_OBJECT (PID) (SELECT CN.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_NODE N, RD_OBJECT_NODE CN WHERE N.PID = CN.NODE_PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_OBJECT (PID) (SELECT CN.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_OBJECT_LINK CN WHERE N.PID = CN.LINK_PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_OBJECT (PID) (SELECT CN.PID FROM TEMP_RD_INTER N, RD_OBJECT_INTER CN WHERE N.PID = CN.INTER_PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_OBJECT (PID) (SELECT CN.PID FROM TEMP_RD_ROAD N, RD_OBJECT_ROAD CN WHERE N.PID = CN.ROAD_PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK (PID) (SELECT P.LINK_PID FROM RD_OBJECT_LINK P, TEMP_RD_OBJECT T WHERE P.PID = T.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_NODE (PID) (SELECT P.NODE_PID FROM RD_OBJECT_NODE P, TEMP_RD_OBJECT T WHERE P.PID = T.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_ROAD2 (PID) (SELECT P.ROAD_PID FROM RD_OBJECT_ROAD P, TEMP_RD_OBJECT T WHERE P.PID = T.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_INTER2 (PID) (SELECT P.INTER_PID FROM RD_OBJECT_INTER P, TEMP_RD_OBJECT T WHERE P.PID = T.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK (PID) (SELECT P.LINK_PID FROM RD_INTER_LINK P, TEMP_RD_INTER2 T WHERE P.PID = T.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_NODE (PID) (SELECT P.NODE_PID FROM RD_INTER_NODE P, TEMP_RD_INTER2 T WHERE P.PID = T.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK (PID) (SELECT P.LINK_PID FROM RD_ROAD_LINK P, TEMP_RD_ROAD2 T WHERE P.PID = T.PID);
INSERT/*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_ROAD(PID)(SELECT PID FROM TEMP_RD_ROAD2 );
INSERT/*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_INTER(PID)(SELECT PID FROM TEMP_RD_INTER2 );
SELECT P.* FROM RD_OBJECT P,TEMP_RD_OBJECT T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_OBJECT_NAME P,TEMP_RD_OBJECT T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_OBJECT_ROAD P,TEMP_RD_OBJECT T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_OBJECT_INTER P,TEMP_RD_OBJECT T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_OBJECT_NODE P,TEMP_RD_OBJECT T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_OBJECT_LINK P,TEMP_RD_OBJECT T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
DELETE FROM RD_OBJECT P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_OBJECT T );
DELETE FROM RD_OBJECT_NAME P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_OBJECT T );
DELETE FROM RD_OBJECT_ROAD P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_OBJECT T );
DELETE FROM RD_OBJECT_INTER P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_OBJECT T );
DELETE FROM RD_OBJECT_NODE P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_OBJECT T );
DELETE FROM RD_OBJECT_LINK P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_OBJECT T );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_OBJECT SELECT PID FROM RD_OBJECT A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM RD_OBJECT B WHERE A.PID = B.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_CROSS (PID) (SELECT CN.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_NODE N, RD_CROSS_NODE CN WHERE N.PID = CN.NODE_PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_CROSS (PID) (SELECT CN.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_CROSS_LINK CN WHERE N.PID = CN.LINK_PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK (PID) (SELECT P.LINK_PID FROM RD_CROSS_LINK P, TEMP_RD_CROSS T WHERE P.PID = T.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_NODE (PID) (SELECT P.NODE_PID FROM RD_CROSS_NODE P, TEMP_RD_CROSS T WHERE P.PID = T.PID);
SELECT P.* FROM RD_CROSS P,TEMP_RD_CROSS T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_CROSS_LINK P,TEMP_RD_CROSS T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_CROSS_NAME P,TEMP_RD_CROSS T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_CROSS_NODE P,TEMP_RD_CROSS T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
DELETE FROM RD_CROSS P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_CROSS T) ;
DELETE FROM RD_CROSS_LINK P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_CROSS T) ;
DELETE FROM RD_CROSS_NAME P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_CROSS T) ;
DELETE FROM RD_CROSS_NODE P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_CROSS T) ;
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_CROSS SELECT PID FROM RD_CROSS A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM RD_CROSS B WHERE A.PID = B.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_VIRCONNECT (PID) (SELECT DISTINCT CN.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_NODE N, RD_VIRCONNECT_TRANSIT CN WHERE (N.PID = CN.FIR_NODE_PID OR N.PID = CN.SEN_NODE_PID));

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_NODE (PID) (SELECT P.FIR_NODE_PID FROM RD_VIRCONNECT_TRANSIT P, TEMP_RD_VIRCONNECT T WHERE P.PID = T.PID UNION ALL SELECT P.SEN_NODE_PID FROM RD_VIRCONNECT_TRANSIT P, TEMP_RD_VIRCONNECT T WHERE P.PID = T.PID);
SELECT P.* FROM RD_VIRCONNECT P,TEMP_RD_VIRCONNECT T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_VIRCONNECT_NAME P,TEMP_RD_VIRCONNECT T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_VIRCONNECT_TRANSIT P,TEMP_RD_VIRCONNECT T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
DELETE FROM RD_VIRCONNECT P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_VIRCONNECT T);
DELETE FROM RD_VIRCONNECT_NAME P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_VIRCONNECT T);
DELETE FROM RD_VIRCONNECT_TRANSIT P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_VIRCONNECT T);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_VIRCONNECT SELECT PID FROM RD_VIRCONNECT A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM RD_VIRCONNECT B WHERE A.PID = B.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_CHAIN (PID) (SELECT DISTINCT CN.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_CHAIN_LINK CN WHERE N.PID = CN.LINK_PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK (PID) (SELECT P.LINK_PID FROM RD_CHAIN_LINK P, TEMP_RD_CHAIN T WHERE P.PID = T.PID);
SELECT P.* FROM RD_CHAIN P,TEMP_RD_CHAIN T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_CHAIN_LINK P,TEMP_RD_CHAIN T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_CHAIN_NAME P,TEMP_RD_CHAIN T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
DELETE FROM RD_CHAIN P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_CHAIN T );
DELETE FROM RD_CHAIN_LINK P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_CHAIN T );
DELETE FROM RD_CHAIN_NAME P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_CHAIN T );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_CHAIN SELECT PID FROM RD_CHAIN A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM RD_CHAIN B WHERE A.PID = B.PID);

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LANE_CONNEXITY (PID) (SELECT CN.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_LANE_CONNEXITY CN WHERE N.PID = CN.IN_LINK_PID UNION SELECT CN.CONNEXITY_PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_LANE_TOPOLOGY CN WHERE N.PID = CN.OUT_LINK_PID UNION SELECT T.CONNEXITY_PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_LANE_VIA CN,RD_LANE_TOPOLOGY T WHERE N.PID = CN.LINK_PID AND CN.TOPOLOGY_ID=T.TOPOLOGY_ID );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LANE_CONNEXITY (PID) (SELECT DISTINCT CN.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_LANE_CONNEXITY CN WHERE N.PID = CN.IN_LINK_PID );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LANE_TOPOLOGY (PID) (SELECT CN.TOPOLOGY_ID FROM TEMP_RD_LANE_CONNEXITY N, RD_LANE_TOPOLOGY CN WHERE N.PID = CN.CONNEXITY_PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK (PID) (SELECT CN.LINK_PID FROM TEMP_RD_LANE_TOPOLOGY N, RD_LANE_VIA CN WHERE N.PID = CN.TOPOLOGY_ID);

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK (PID) (SELECT CN.OUT_LINK_PID FROM TEMP_RD_LANE_TOPOLOGY N, RD_LANE_TOPOLOGY CN WHERE N.PID = CN.TOPOLOGY_ID UNION ALL SELECT CN.IN_LINK_PID FROM TEMP_RD_LANE_CONNEXITY N, RD_LANE_CONNEXITY CN WHERE N.PID = CN.PID );
SELECT P.* FROM RD_LANE_CONNEXITY P,TEMP_RD_LANE_CONNEXITY T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_LANE_VIA P,TEMP_RD_LANE_TOPOLOGY T WHERE P.TOPOLOGY_ID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_LANE_TOPOLOGY P,TEMP_RD_LANE_TOPOLOGY T WHERE P.TOPOLOGY_ID=T.PID;
DELETE FROM RD_LANE_CONNEXITY P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_LANE_CONNEXITY T );
DELETE FROM RD_LANE_VIA P WHERE P.TOPOLOGY_ID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_LANE_TOPOLOGY T );
DELETE FROM RD_LANE_TOPOLOGY P WHERE P.TOPOLOGY_ID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_LANE_TOPOLOGY T );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LANE_CONNEXITY SELECT PID FROM RD_LANE_CONNEXITY A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM RD_LANE_CONNEXITY B WHERE A.PID = B.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LANE_TOPOLOGY (PID) (SELECT CN.TOPOLOGY_ID FROM TEMP_RD_LANE_CONNEXITY N, RD_LANE_TOPOLOGY CN WHERE N.PID = CN.CONNEXITY_PID);

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_GATE (PID) (SELECT CN.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_GATE CN WHERE N.PID = CN.IN_LINK_PID UNION SELECT CN.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_GATE CN WHERE N.PID = CN.OUT_LINK_PID );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_GATE (PID) (SELECT DISTINCT CN.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_GATE CN WHERE N.PID = CN.IN_LINK_PID );

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK (PID) (SELECT CN.OUT_LINK_PID FROM TEMP_RD_GATE N, RD_GATE CN WHERE N.PID = CN.PID UNION ALL SELECT CN.IN_LINK_PID FROM TEMP_RD_GATE N, RD_GATE CN WHERE N.PID = CN.PID );
SELECT P.* FROM RD_GATE P,TEMP_RD_GATE T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_GATE_CONDITION P,TEMP_RD_GATE GA WHERE GA.PID=P.PID;
DELETE FROM RD_GATE P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_GATE T );
DELETE FROM RD_GATE_CONDITION P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_GATE T );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_GATE SELECT PID FROM RD_GATE A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM RD_GATE B WHERE A.PID = B.PID);

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_VARIABLE_SPEED (PID) (SELECT CN.VSPEED_PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_VARIABLE_SPEED CN WHERE N.PID = CN.IN_LINK_PID UNION SELECT CN.VSPEED_PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_VARIABLE_SPEED CN WHERE N.PID = CN.OUT_LINK_PID UNION SELECT CN.VSPEED_PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_VARIABLE_SPEED_VIA CN WHERE N.PID = CN.LINK_PID );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_VARIABLE_SPEED (PID) (SELECT DISTINCT CN.VSPEED_PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_VARIABLE_SPEED CN WHERE N.PID = CN.IN_LINK_PID );

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK (PID) (SELECT CN.OUT_LINK_PID FROM TEMP_RD_VARIABLE_SPEED N, RD_VARIABLE_SPEED CN WHERE N.PID = CN.VSPEED_PID UNION ALL SELECT CN.IN_LINK_PID FROM TEMP_RD_VARIABLE_SPEED N, RD_VARIABLE_SPEED CN WHERE N.PID = CN.VSPEED_PID UNION ALL SELECT CN.LINK_PID FROM TEMP_RD_VARIABLE_SPEED N, RD_VARIABLE_SPEED_VIA CN WHERE N.PID = CN.VSPEED_PID );
SELECT P.* FROM RD_VARIABLE_SPEED P,TEMP_RD_VARIABLE_SPEED T WHERE P.VSPEED_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_VARIABLE_SPEED_VIA P,TEMP_RD_VARIABLE_SPEED T WHERE P.VSPEED_PID=T.PID;
DELETE FROM RD_VARIABLE_SPEED P WHERE P.VSPEED_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_VARIABLE_SPEED T );
DELETE FROM RD_VARIABLE_SPEED_VIA P WHERE P.VSPEED_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_VARIABLE_SPEED T );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_VARIABLE_SPEED SELECT VSPEED_PID FROM RD_VARIABLE_SPEED A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM RD_VARIABLE_SPEED B WHERE A.VSPEED_PID = B.VSPEED_PID);

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_NATGUD_JUN (PID) (SELECT CN.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_NATGUD_JUN CN WHERE N.PID = CN.IN_LINK_PID UNION SELECT CN.NG_COND_PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_NATGUD_JUN_DETAIL CN WHERE N.PID = CN.OUT_LINK_PID UNION SELECT D.NG_COND_PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_NATGUD_JUN_VIA CN , RD_NATGUD_JUN_DETAIL D WHERE N.PID = CN.LINK_PID and CN.DETAIL_ID = D.DETAIL_ID );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_NATGUD_JUN (PID) (SELECT distinct CN.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_NATGUD_JUN CN WHERE N.PID = CN.IN_LINK_PID );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_NATGUD_JUN (PID) (SELECT distinct N.NG_COND_PID FROM IX_NATGUD CN ,RD_NATGUD_JUN_DETAIL N WHERE N.NG_ASSO_PID = CN.PID and CN.MESH_ID [mesh] );

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_NATGUD_JUN (PID) (SELECT distinct N.NG_COND_PID FROM IX_NATGUD CN ,RD_NATGUD_JUN_DETAIL N WHERE N.NG_ASSO_PID = CN.PID and SDO_ANYINTERACT(CN.GEOMETRY, [area]) = 'TRUE');
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_IX_NATGUD (PID) (SELECT distinct CN.PID FROM IX_NATGUD CN WHERE CN.MESH_ID [mesh] );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_IX_NATGUD (PID) (SELECT distinct CN.PID FROM IX_NATGUD CN WHERE SDO_ANYINTERACT(CN.GEOMETRY, [area]) = 'TRUE');
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_IX_NATGUD (PID) ( SELECT distinct CN.NG_ASSO_PID FROM TEMP_RD_NATGUD_JUN N, RD_NATGUD_JUN_DETAIL CN WHERE CN.NG_COND_PID = N.PID );

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK (PID) (SELECT CN.IN_LINK_PID FROM (select distinct PID from TEMP_RD_NATGUD_JUN) N, RD_NATGUD_JUN CN WHERE N.PID = CN.PID UNION ALL SELECT CN.OUT_LINK_PID FROM (select distinct PID from TEMP_RD_NATGUD_JUN) N, RD_NATGUD_JUN_DETAIL CN WHERE N.PID = CN.NG_COND_PID UNION ALL SELECT VA.LINK_PID FROM (select distinct PID from TEMP_RD_NATGUD_JUN) N, RD_NATGUD_JUN_DETAIL CN , RD_NATGUD_JUN_VIA VA WHERE CN.DETAIL_ID = VA.DETAIL_ID and CN.NG_COND_PID = N.PID );
SELECT P.* FROM RD_NATGUD_JUN P,TEMP_RD_NATGUD_JUN T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_NATGUD_JUN_DETAIL P,TEMP_RD_NATGUD_JUN T WHERE P.NG_COND_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_NATGUD_JUN_VIA P, RD_NATGUD_JUN_DETAIL p2 ,TEMP_RD_NATGUD_JUN T WHERE p.DETAIL_ID = p2.DETAIL_ID and P2.NG_COND_PID=T.PID;
select P.* FROM IX_NATGUD P,TEMP_IX_NATGUD T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
select P.* FROM IX_NATGUD_NAME P,TEMP_IX_NATGUD T WHERE P.NG_ASSO_PID=T.PID;
DELETE FROM RD_NATGUD_JUN P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_NATGUD_JUN T );
DELETE FROM RD_NATGUD_JUN_DETAIL P WHERE P.NG_COND_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_NATGUD_JUN T );
DELETE FROM RD_NATGUD_JUN_VIA P WHERE p.DETAIL_ID IN (SELECT p2.DETAIL_ID FROM RD_NATGUD_JUN_DETAIL p2, TEMP_RD_NATGUD_JUN T where P2.NG_COND_PID=T.PID );
DELETE FROM IX_NATGUD P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_IX_NATGUD T );
DELETE FROM IX_NATGUD_NAME P WHERE p.NG_ASSO_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_IX_NATGUD T );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_NATGUD_JUN SELECT PID FROM RD_NATGUD_JUN A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM RD_NATGUD_JUN B WHERE A.PID = B.PID);

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_SE (PID) (SELECT CN.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_SE CN WHERE N.PID = CN.IN_LINK_PID UNION SELECT CN.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_SE CN WHERE N.PID = CN.OUT_LINK_PID );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_SE (PID) (SELECT DISTINCT CN.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_SE CN WHERE N.PID = CN.IN_LINK_PID );

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK (PID) (SELECT CN.OUT_LINK_PID FROM TEMP_RD_SE N, RD_SE CN WHERE N.PID = CN.PID UNION ALL SELECT CN.IN_LINK_PID FROM TEMP_RD_SE N, RD_SE CN WHERE N.PID = CN.PID );
SELECT P.* FROM RD_SE P,TEMP_RD_SE T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
DELETE FROM RD_SE P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_SE T );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_SE SELECT PID FROM RD_SE A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM RD_SE B WHERE A.PID = B.PID);

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_TOLLGATE (PID) (SELECT CN.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_TOLLGATE CN WHERE N.PID = CN.IN_LINK_PID UNION SELECT CN.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_TOLLGATE CN WHERE N.PID = CN.OUT_LINK_PID );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_TOLLGATE (PID) (SELECT DISTINCT CN.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_TOLLGATE CN WHERE N.PID = CN.IN_LINK_PID );

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK (PID) (SELECT CN.OUT_LINK_PID FROM TEMP_RD_TOLLGATE N, RD_TOLLGATE CN WHERE N.PID = CN.PID UNION ALL SELECT CN.IN_LINK_PID FROM TEMP_RD_TOLLGATE N, RD_TOLLGATE CN WHERE N.PID = CN.PID );
SELECT P.* FROM RD_TOLLGATE P,TEMP_RD_TOLLGATE T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_TOLLGATE_NAME P,TEMP_RD_TOLLGATE T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_TOLLGATE_PASSAGE P,TEMP_RD_TOLLGATE T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
SELECT DISTINCT P.* FROM RD_TOLLGATE_COST P,TEMP_RD_TOLLGATE T WHERE (P.IN_TOLLGATE=T.PID OR P.OUT_TOLLGATE=T.PID);
DELETE FROM RD_TOLLGATE P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_TOLLGATE T );
DELETE FROM RD_TOLLGATE_NAME P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_TOLLGATE T );
DELETE FROM RD_TOLLGATE_PASSAGE P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_TOLLGATE T );
DELETE FROM RD_TOLLGATE_COST P WHERE P.IN_TOLLGATE IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_TOLLGATE T );
DELETE FROM RD_TOLLGATE_COST P WHERE P.OUT_TOLLGATE IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_TOLLGATE T );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_TOLLGATE SELECT PID FROM RD_TOLLGATE A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM RD_TOLLGATE B WHERE A.PID = B.PID);

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_BRANCH (PID) (SELECT CN.BRANCH_PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_BRANCH CN WHERE N.PID = CN.IN_LINK_PID UNION SELECT CN.BRANCH_PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_BRANCH CN WHERE N.PID = CN.OUT_LINK_PID UNION SELECT CN.BRANCH_PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_BRANCH_VIA CN WHERE N.PID = CN.LINK_PID );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_BRANCH (PID) (SELECT DISTINCT CN.BRANCH_PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_BRANCH CN WHERE N.PID = CN.IN_LINK_PID );

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK (PID) (SELECT CN.OUT_LINK_PID FROM TEMP_RD_BRANCH N, RD_BRANCH CN WHERE N.PID = CN.BRANCH_PID UNION ALL SELECT CN.IN_LINK_PID FROM TEMP_RD_BRANCH N, RD_BRANCH CN WHERE N.PID = CN.BRANCH_PID );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_BRANCH_DETAIL (PID) (SELECT CN.DETAIL_ID FROM TEMP_RD_BRANCH N, RD_BRANCH_DETAIL CN WHERE N.PID = CN.BRANCH_PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_SIGNBOARD (PID) (SELECT DISTINCT CN.SIGNBOARD_ID FROM TEMP_RD_BRANCH N, RD_SIGNBOARD CN WHERE N.PID = CN.BRANCH_PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK (PID) (SELECT CN.LINK_PID FROM TEMP_RD_BRANCH N, RD_BRANCH_VIA CN WHERE N.PID = CN.BRANCH_PID);
SELECT P.* FROM RD_BRANCH P,TEMP_RD_BRANCH T WHERE P.BRANCH_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_SIGNASREAL P,TEMP_RD_BRANCH T WHERE P.BRANCH_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_BRANCH_REALIMAGE P,TEMP_RD_BRANCH T WHERE P.BRANCH_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_BRANCH_SCHEMATIC P,TEMP_RD_BRANCH T WHERE P.BRANCH_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_SERIESBRANCH P,TEMP_RD_BRANCH T WHERE P.BRANCH_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_BRANCH_VIA P,TEMP_RD_BRANCH T WHERE P.BRANCH_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_BRANCH_DETAIL P,TEMP_RD_BRANCH_DETAIL T WHERE P.DETAIL_ID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_BRANCH_NAME P,TEMP_RD_BRANCH_DETAIL T WHERE P.DETAIL_ID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_BRANCH_NAME_TONE P,(SELECT P.NAME_ID FROM RD_BRANCH_NAME P,TEMP_RD_BRANCH_DETAIL T WHERE P.DETAIL_ID=T.PID) T WHERE P.NAME_ID=T.NAME_ID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_SIGNBOARD P,TEMP_RD_SIGNBOARD T WHERE P.SIGNBOARD_ID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_SIGNBOARD_NAME P,TEMP_RD_SIGNBOARD T WHERE P.SIGNBOARD_ID=T.PID;
DELETE FROM RD_BRANCH P WHERE P.BRANCH_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_BRANCH T );
DELETE FROM RD_BRANCH_REALIMAGE P WHERE P.BRANCH_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_BRANCH T );
DELETE FROM RD_BRANCH_SCHEMATIC P WHERE P.BRANCH_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_BRANCH T );
DELETE FROM RD_SERIESBRANCH P WHERE P.BRANCH_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_BRANCH T );
DELETE FROM RD_SIGNASREAL P WHERE P.BRANCH_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_BRANCH T );
DELETE FROM RD_BRANCH_VIA P WHERE P.BRANCH_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_BRANCH T );
DELETE FROM RD_BRANCH_DETAIL P WHERE P.DETAIL_ID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_BRANCH_DETAIL T );
DELETE FROM RD_BRANCH_NAME P WHERE P.DETAIL_ID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_BRANCH_DETAIL T );
DELETE FROM RD_BRANCH_NAME_TONE P WHERE P.NAME_ID IN (SELECT P.NAME_ID FROM RD_BRANCH_NAME P, TEMP_RD_BRANCH_DETAIL T WHERE P.DETAIL_ID = T.PID);
DELETE FROM RD_SIGNBOARD P WHERE P.SIGNBOARD_ID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_SIGNBOARD T );
DELETE FROM RD_SIGNBOARD_NAME P WHERE P.SIGNBOARD_ID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_SIGNBOARD T );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_BRANCH SELECT BRANCH_PID FROM RD_BRANCH A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM RD_BRANCH B WHERE A.BRANCH_PID = B.BRANCH_PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_SIGNBOARD SELECT SIGNBOARD_ID FROM RD_SIGNBOARD A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM RD_SIGNBOARD B WHERE A.SIGNBOARD_ID = B.SIGNBOARD_ID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_BRANCH_DETAIL (PID) (SELECT CN.DETAIL_ID FROM TEMP_RD_BRANCH N, RD_BRANCH_DETAIL CN WHERE N.PID = CN.BRANCH_PID);

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_VOICEGUIDE (PID) (SELECT CN.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_VOICEGUIDE CN WHERE N.PID = CN.IN_LINK_PID UNION SELECT CN.VOICEGUIDE_PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_VOICEGUIDE_DETAIL CN WHERE N.PID = CN.OUT_LINK_PID UNION SELECT T.VOICEGUIDE_PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_VOICEGUIDE_VIA CN ,RD_VOICEGUIDE_DETAIL T WHERE N.PID = CN.LINK_PID AND CN.DETAIL_ID=T.DETAIL_ID );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_VOICEGUIDE (PID) (SELECT DISTINCT CN.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_VOICEGUIDE CN WHERE N.PID = CN.IN_LINK_PID );

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK (PID) (SELECT CN.OUT_LINK_PID FROM TEMP_RD_VOICEGUIDE N, RD_VOICEGUIDE_DETAIL CN WHERE N.PID = CN.VOICEGUIDE_PID UNION ALL SELECT CN.IN_LINK_PID FROM TEMP_RD_VOICEGUIDE N, RD_VOICEGUIDE CN WHERE N.PID = CN.PID );

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK (PID) (SELECT P.LINK_PID FROM RD_VOICEGUIDE_VIA P, (SELECT P.DETAIL_ID FROM RD_VOICEGUIDE_DETAIL P, TEMP_RD_VOICEGUIDE T WHERE P.VOICEGUIDE_PID = T.PID) T WHERE P.DETAIL_ID = T.DETAIL_ID);
SELECT P.* FROM RD_VOICEGUIDE P,TEMP_RD_VOICEGUIDE T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_VOICEGUIDE_VIA P, (SELECT distinct P.DETAIL_ID FROM RD_VOICEGUIDE_DETAIL P, TEMP_RD_VOICEGUIDE T WHERE P.VOICEGUIDE_PID = T.PID) T WHERE P.DETAIL_ID = T.DETAIL_ID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_VOICEGUIDE_DETAIL P,TEMP_RD_VOICEGUIDE T WHERE P.VOICEGUIDE_PID=T.PID;
DELETE FROM RD_VOICEGUIDE P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_VOICEGUIDE T );
DELETE FROM RD_VOICEGUIDE_DETAIL P WHERE P.VOICEGUIDE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_VOICEGUIDE T );
DELETE FROM RD_VOICEGUIDE_VIA P WHERE P.DETAIL_ID IN (SELECT P.DETAIL_ID FROM RD_VOICEGUIDE_DETAIL P, TEMP_RD_VOICEGUIDE T WHERE P.VOICEGUIDE_PID = T.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_VOICEGUIDE SELECT PID FROM RD_VOICEGUIDE A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM RD_VOICEGUIDE B WHERE A.PID = B.PID);

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_RESTRICTION (PID) (SELECT CN.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_RESTRICTION CN WHERE N.PID = CN.IN_LINK_PID UNION SELECT CN.RESTRIC_PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_RESTRICTION_DETAIL CN WHERE N.PID = CN.OUT_LINK_PID UNION SELECT T.RESTRIC_PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_RESTRICTION_VIA CN,RD_RESTRICTION_DETAIL T WHERE N.PID = CN.LINK_PID AND CN.DETAIL_ID=T.DETAIL_ID );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_RESTRICTION (PID) (SELECT DISTINCT CN.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_RESTRICTION CN WHERE N.PID = CN.IN_LINK_PID );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_RESTRICTION_DETAIL (PID) (SELECT CN.DETAIL_ID FROM TEMP_RD_RESTRICTION N, RD_RESTRICTION_DETAIL CN WHERE N.PID = CN.RESTRIC_PID);

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK (PID) (SELECT CN.OUT_LINK_PID FROM TEMP_RD_RESTRICTION N, RD_RESTRICTION_DETAIL CN WHERE N.PID = CN.RESTRIC_PID UNION ALL SELECT CN.IN_LINK_PID FROM TEMP_RD_RESTRICTION N, RD_RESTRICTION CN WHERE N.PID = CN.PID );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK (PID) (SELECT CN.LINK_PID FROM TEMP_RD_RESTRICTION_DETAIL N, RD_RESTRICTION_VIA CN WHERE N.PID = CN.DETAIL_ID);
SELECT P.* FROM RD_RESTRICTION P,TEMP_RD_RESTRICTION T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_RESTRICTION_CONDITION P,TEMP_RD_RESTRICTION_DETAIL T WHERE P.DETAIL_ID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_RESTRICTION_VIA P,TEMP_RD_RESTRICTION_DETAIL T WHERE P.DETAIL_ID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_RESTRICTION_DETAIL P,TEMP_RD_RESTRICTION_DETAIL T WHERE P.DETAIL_ID=T.PID;
DELETE FROM RD_RESTRICTION P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_RESTRICTION T );
DELETE FROM RD_RESTRICTION_CONDITION P WHERE P.DETAIL_ID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_RESTRICTION_DETAIL T );
DELETE FROM RD_RESTRICTION_VIA P WHERE P.DETAIL_ID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_RESTRICTION_DETAIL T );
DELETE FROM RD_RESTRICTION_DETAIL P WHERE P.DETAIL_ID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_RESTRICTION_DETAIL T );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_RESTRICTION SELECT PID FROM TEMP_RD_RESTRICTION A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM RD_RESTRICTION B WHERE A.PID = B.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_RESTRICTION_DETAIL (PID) (SELECT CN.DETAIL_ID FROM TEMP_RD_RESTRICTION N, RD_RESTRICTION_DETAIL CN WHERE N.PID = CN.RESTRIC_PID);

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_DIRECTROUTE (PID) (SELECT CN.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_DIRECTROUTE CN WHERE N.PID = CN.IN_LINK_PID UNION SELECT CN.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_DIRECTROUTE CN WHERE N.PID = CN.OUT_LINK_PID UNION SELECT CN.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_DIRECTROUTE_VIA CN WHERE N.PID = CN.LINK_PID
);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_DIRECTROUTE (PID) (SELECT DISTINCT CN.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_DIRECTROUTE CN WHERE N.PID = CN.IN_LINK_PID );

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK (PID) (SELECT CN.OUT_LINK_PID FROM TEMP_RD_DIRECTROUTE N, RD_DIRECTROUTE CN WHERE N.PID = CN.PID UNION ALL SELECT CN.IN_LINK_PID FROM TEMP_RD_DIRECTROUTE N, RD_DIRECTROUTE CN WHERE N.PID = CN.PID );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK (PID) (SELECT CN.LINK_PID FROM TEMP_RD_DIRECTROUTE N, RD_DIRECTROUTE_VIA CN WHERE N.PID = CN.PID);
SELECT P.* FROM RD_DIRECTROUTE P,TEMP_RD_DIRECTROUTE T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_DIRECTROUTE_VIA P,TEMP_RD_DIRECTROUTE T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
DELETE FROM RD_DIRECTROUTE P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_DIRECTROUTE T );
DELETE FROM RD_DIRECTROUTE_VIA P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_DIRECTROUTE T );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_DIRECTROUTE SELECT PID FROM RD_DIRECTROUTE A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM RD_DIRECTROUTE B WHERE A.PID = B.PID);
SELECT DISTINCT P.* FROM RD_MAINSIDE_LINK P ,TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P2.* FROM RD_MAINSIDE P2, (SELECT DISTINCT P.GROUP_ID FROM RD_MAINSIDE_LINK P, TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID = T.PID) T2 WHERE P2.GROUP_ID = T2.GROUP_ID;
DELETE FROM RD_MAINSIDE_LINK P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T );
DELETE FROM RD_MAINSIDE P2 WHERE P2.GROUP_ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT P.GROUP_ID FROM RD_MAINSIDE_LINK P, TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID = T.PID) ;
SELECT DISTINCT P.* FROM RD_MULTIDIGITIZED_LINK P ,TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P2.* FROM RD_MULTIDIGITIZED P2, (SELECT DISTINCT P.GROUP_ID FROM RD_MULTIDIGITIZED_LINK P, TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID = T.PID) T2 WHERE P2.GROUP_ID = T2.GROUP_ID;
DELETE FROM RD_MULTIDIGITIZED_LINK P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T );
DELETE FROM RD_MULTIDIGITIZED P2 WHERE P2.GROUP_ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT P.GROUP_ID FROM RD_MULTIDIGITIZED_LINK P, TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID = T.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_CROSSWALK (PID) (SELECT DISTINCT CN.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_NODE N, RD_CROSSWALK_INFO CN WHERE N.PID = CN.NODE_PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK (PID) (SELECT P.LINK_PID FROM RD_CROSSWALK_INFO P, TEMP_RD_CROSSWALK T WHERE P.PID = T.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_NODE (PID) (SELECT P.NODE_PID FROM RD_CROSSWALK_INFO P, TEMP_RD_CROSSWALK T WHERE P.PID = T.PID);

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_NODE (PID) (SELECT P.FIR_NODE_PID FROM RD_CROSSWALK_NODE P, TEMP_RD_CROSSWALK T WHERE P.PID = T.PID UNION ALL SELECT P.SEN_NODE_PID FROM RD_CROSSWALK_NODE P, TEMP_RD_CROSSWALK T WHERE P.PID = T.PID);
SELECT P.* FROM RD_CROSSWALK_INFO P,TEMP_RD_CROSSWALK T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_CROSSWALK P,TEMP_RD_CROSSWALK T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_CROSSWALK_NODE P,TEMP_RD_CROSSWALK T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
DELETE FROM RD_CROSSWALK P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_CROSSWALK T );
DELETE FROM RD_CROSSWALK_INFO P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_CROSSWALK T );
DELETE FROM RD_CROSSWALK_NODE P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_CROSSWALK T );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_CROSSWALK SELECT PID FROM RD_CROSSWALK A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM RD_CROSSWALK B WHERE A.PID = B.PID);

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_SLOPE (PID) (SELECT DISTINCT CN.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_SLOPE CN WHERE N.PID = CN.LINK_PID UNION SELECT DISTINCT CN.SLOPE_PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_SLOPE_VIA CN WHERE N.PID = CN.LINK_PID)
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_SLOPE (PID) (SELECT DISTINCT CN.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_SLOPE CN WHERE N.PID = CN.LINK_PID )

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK (PID) (SELECT P.LINK_PID FROM RD_SLOPE_VIA P, TEMP_RD_SLOPE T WHERE P.SLOPE_PID = T.PID union SELECT P.LINK_PID FROM RD_SLOPE P, TEMP_RD_SLOPE T WHERE P.PID = T.PID );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_NODE (PID) (SELECT P.NODE_PID FROM RD_SLOPE P, TEMP_RD_SLOPE T WHERE P.PID = T.PID );
SELECT P.* FROM RD_SLOPE P,TEMP_RD_SLOPE T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_SLOPE_VIA P,TEMP_RD_SLOPE T WHERE P.SLOPE_PID=T.PID;
DELETE FROM RD_SLOPE P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_SLOPE T );
DELETE FROM RD_SLOPE_VIA P WHERE P.SLOPE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_SLOPE T );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_SLOPE SELECT PID FROM RD_SLOPE A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM RD_SLOPE B WHERE A.PID = B.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK_TMC (PID) (SELECT DISTINCT P.GROUP_ID FROM RD_TMCLOCATION_LINK P, TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID = T.PID);

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LANE_TOPO_DETAIL (PID) (SELECT TD.TOPO_ID FROM RD_LANE_TOPO_DETAIL TD, TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE (TD.IN_LINK_PID = T.PID OR TD.OUT_LINK_PID = T.PID) UNION SELECT VI.TOPO_ID FROM RD_LANE_TOPO_VIA VI, TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE VI.VIA_LINK_PID = T.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LANE_TOPO_DETAIL (PID) (SELECT TD.TOPO_ID FROM RD_LANE_TOPO_DETAIL TD, TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE TD.IN_LINK_PID = T.PID);

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LANE (PID) (SELECT P.IN_LINK_PID FROM RD_LANE_TOPO_DETAIL P, TEMP_RD_LANE_TOPO_DETAIL T WHERE P.TOPO_ID = T.PID UNION ALL SELECT P.OUT_LINK_PID FROM RD_LANE_TOPO_DETAIL P, TEMP_RD_LANE_TOPO_DETAIL T WHERE P.TOPO_ID = T.PID UNION ALL SELECT V.VIA_LINK_PID FROM RD_LANE_TOPO_VIA V, TEMP_RD_LANE_TOPO_DETAIL T WHERE V.TOPO_ID = T.PID );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK (PID) (SELECT P.PID FROM TEMP_RD_LANE P);
